text: Steve Reid is an American jazz percussionist and founding member of The Rippingtons. He began as a session musician in the 1970s, playing on hundreds of recordings. He co-founded The Rippingtons in 1987 and played with Supertramp in 1987–88. In 1993, 1995, and 1997 he was named Percussionist of the Year by Jazziz magazine. ==Discography== * Bamboo Forest (Sugo, 1994) * Water Sign (Telarc, 1996) * Mysteries (Telarc, 1997) * Dream Scapes (Eagle Music Group, 2001) ==References== Category:American jazz drummers Category:The Rippingtons members Category:Domo Records artists Category:Telarc Records artists
title: Steve Reid (musician)
